headline: AppLovin Stock Is Worth $100 Billion. How Did We Miss It?
summary: AppLovin has a funny name, it hasn’t been around very long, and its stock has soared $100 in a month. And its AI is getting smarter, which has allowed it to begin dipping its toes into e-commerce.
